official_title: A resolution disapproving the action of the District of Columbia Council in approving the prohibition of the investment of public funds in financial institutions and companies making loans to or doing business with the Republic of South Africa or Namibia Act of 1983.

summary.text: Declares that the House of Representatives disapproves of the Act passed by the District of Columbia Council and signed by the Mayor, namely: The Prohibition of the Investment of Public Funds in Financial Institutions and Companies Making Loans to or Doing Business with the Republic of South Africa or Namibia Act of 1983.

titles.title: A resolution disapproving the action of the District of Columbia Council in approving the prohibition of the investment of public funds in financial institutions and companies making loans to or doing business with the Republic of South Africa or Namibia Act of 1983.
